properties.entry:
SELECT
MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_PHONE , MEMBER_DATE , MEMBER_STATUS , MEMBER_POINT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = '12345678' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_POINT = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = D WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
